headline: SUN ELECTRONICS SYSTEMS TEMPERATURE CHAMBER -73C TO 315C, 6.16 CU.FT
description: Temperature Chamber Liquid CO2, High Pressure 850 PSI
keywords: thermal thermal cycle environmental shock testing
categories.lvl1: Heating & Cooling > Environmental and Temperature Test Chambers
categories.lvl2: Heating & Cooling  >  Environmental and Temperature Test Chambers > Temperature Chambers
specstable:
Manufacturer Sun Elect. Sys
Model EC16
Minimum Temperature -73 ºC (-99 ºF, 200.00 ºK)
Maximum Temperature 315 ºC (599 ºF, 588 ºK)
Temperature Control
Control Stability ± 0.500 ºC
Heat/Cool Controls
Control Type Programmable
Overtemperature Protection YES
Interface IEEE 488-GPIB
Capacity/Volume Box 6.16 cu ft (0.17 cu m)
Chamber Characteristics
Chamber Construction Stainless Steel
Number and Size of Access Ports 2-3" Left side
Chamber Size
Width 22.00 in (55.88 cm)
Depth 22.00 in (55.88 cm)
Height 22.00 in (55.88 cm)
External Cooling Air Cooled
Accessories

Remote Control: RS232 / RS422 / IEEE-488 bus

Other Information

Chamber configured for LCO2 @ 850 PSI


Features:

  • Heat/cool enable and disable switches
  • Battery backed memory
  • Setup menus for probe CAL.
  • Time of day clock
  • Remote interrupt operation and default conditions for alarms and interfaces
  • IEEE/RS232/RS422/IO Port Controller:
  • Programmable controller Model TC10
  • 100 plus segments (Temps. and Time)
  • Stability per month: ±0.2°C
  • Resolution: 0.02°C
  • Gas coolant usage @ 0°C 2 lbs hour(LCO2)
  • Hot/cold rate of exchange: 0.5°C/sec
  • Air flow: 60 CFM
  • Digital readout
  • CE label


Power: 6000W at 220V, 50/60 Hz, Single Phase

Extended Description Details at Sun Electronics EC16.PDF
Power Requirements 220 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Year of Manufacture 2005
Exterior Dimensions
Width 32.000 in (81.3 cm)
Depth 36.000 in (91.4 cm)
Height 29.500 in (74.9 cm)
Weight 139 lb (63 kg)
